briefTitle: ALK21-010: Long-term Safety of Medisorb® Naltrexone (VIVITROL®) in Alcohol-dependent Adults

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Primary Inclusion Criteria:

* Completed Study ALK21-003-EXT (NCT01218971), receiving all 13 injections
* Willing and able to return for scheduled clinic visits and study assessments
* Noncustodial, stable address and phone
* Written, informed consent

Primary Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnancy or lactation
* Terminated early from study drug in Study ALK21-003-EXT (NCT01218971)

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants Reporting at Least 1 Treatment-emergent Adverse Event (TEAE)
outcomeMeasures.description: A TEAE is any adverse event (AE), whether or not considered drug-related, that develops or worsens in severity after study drug administration begins (ie, from the first administration in this extension through the end of the follow-up period).
